sentence: So weve got years of people calling into question elections any time theyre close.? More than a week after voting ended in Georgia in 2018, Abrams gave a carefully worded speech in which she accused her opponent, then-Secretary of State Brian Kemp, of voter suppression, while also acknowledging he would be certified the victor of the election.
title: After 2020, a candidate conceding an election is no longer a sure thing

sentence: In Georgia, Governor Brian Kemp signed a bill in March that will provide eligible state residents with additional economic payments after they file their taxes.
author: Matthew Impelli
title: Fourth Stimulus Check Update: Some Americans Eligible for More Money

author: Reid Wilson
title: Ask me nicely: Trump demanded loyalty from governors for help, says book

author: Greg Sargent
title: Opinion Trumps alarming GOP primary wins demand a serious response
